description.narrative: The estimated project cost for the construction of the solar plant is USD 72 million. FMO is participating in a debt financing package mobilized by EBRD. All output generated by the project will be sold to off-taker NEPCO under a 20-year Power Purchase Agreement (PPA). The project is part of the Government of Jordan’s Renewable Energy Program, which aims to increase renewable energy contribution to 10 percent of the country’s generation mix by 2020.

participating-org.narrative: Al Sharika Al Mahaliya Li Aamal Al Miyah Wa Al Taka Al Shamsia PSC
